bibl.title: A Monologue of New Comedy on the Athenian Stage (PCG VIII 1001).
bibl.note: P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 7172 = P. Didot 2-15 (= M.-P.3 1319; LDAB 1048) = fr. com. adesp. 1001 Kassel-Austin. - The Asklepieion and Theater of Dionysos in the fourth century. - Asklepios, Vision, and Metatheater in fr. Didot b. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: WICKKISER Bronwen L., A Monologue of New Comedy on the Athenian Stage (PCG VIII 1001).
